summary.span: 为实现 接口的数据绑定控件（例如 控件）提供分页功能。

span.span: Provides paging functionality for data-bound controls that implement the interface, such as the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [页导航字段Pager Fields](#pager_fields) - [页面属性Page Properties](#page_properties) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction @No__t-0 类用于对数据进行分页，并显示实现 接口的数据绑定控件的导航控件。The class is used to page data and to display navigation controls for data-bound controls that implement the interface. （@No__t-0 控件是实现接口的控件的一个示例。）(An example of a control that implements the interface is the control.) 您可以使用 @no__t 属性将 @no__t 0 控件与数据绑定控件关联起来。You can associate the control with the data-bound control by using the property. 或者，您可以将 控件放在数据绑定控件层次结构中。Alternatively, you can put the control inside the data-bound control hierarchy. 例如，在 控件中，可以将 @no__t 控件放在 @no__t 2 模板中。For example, in the control, you can put the control inside the template. 您可以通过更改 @no__t 的属性来自定义为每个数据页显示的项目数。You can customize the number of items that are displayed for each page of data by changing the property. 还可以通过设置 @no__t 的属性来更改向服务器提交页面的方式。You can also change the way a page is submitted to the server by setting the property. ## 页导航字段Pager Fields 为了使 @no__t 0 控件能够显示导航控件，必须将页导航字段添加到控件。In order for the control to display navigation controls, you must add pager fields to the control. 页导航字段派生自 @no__t 0 类。The pager fields derive from the class. 下表列出了可以使用的页导航字段类型。The following table lists the pager field types that you can use. |页导航字段类型Pager field type|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||允许用户一次在页面上导航，或跳转到第一页或最后一页。Enables users to navigate through pages one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page.| ||允许用户按页码选择页。Enables users to select a page by page number.| ||使您能够创建自定义分页 UI。Enables you to create a custom paging UI.| 若要以声明方式将页导航字段添加到 控件，请将 @no__t 元素添加到 @no__t 控件中。To declaratively add pager fields to the control, add a `Fields` element to the control. 然后，可以将页导航字段添加到 `Fields` 元素。You can then add the pager fields to the `Fields` element. 页导航字段将按照它们在 `Fields` 元素中出现的顺序添加到 @no__t 集合中。The pager fields are added to the collection in the order that they appear in the `Fields` element. @No__t 集合可用于以编程方式管理 @no__t 控件中的页导航字段。The collection enables you to programmatically manage the pager fields in the control. ## 页面属性Page Properties 下表列出了 控件的只读属性，这些属性指定了数据页的特性。The following table lists read-only properties of the control that specify characteristics of the page of data. 这些属性通常用于 对象中的绑定表达式。These properties are usually used for binding expressions in the object. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为每个数据页显示的最大记录数。The maximum number of records that are displayed for each page of data.| ||在数据页上显示的第一条记录的索引。The index of the first record that is displayed on a page of data.| ||基础数据源中可用的记录总数。The total number of records that are available in the underlying data source.| ## 可访问性Accessibility 为此控件呈现默认标记的默认标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，例如 Web 内容可访问性准则1.0 （WCAG）优先级1指导原则。The default markup that is rendered default for this control might not comply with accessibility standards, such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                          ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将分页功能添加到 @no__t 0 控件。The following example shows how to add paging functionality to a control. 此示例包含两个 @no__t 0 的控件，这些控件用于对同一 @no__t 1 控件的数据进行分页。This example contains two controls that are used to page through data of the same control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager/CS/DataPagerCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager/VB/DataPagerVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks @No__t-0 方法由 @no__t 属性和 方法用来创建 属性包含的 @no__t 3 个对象。The method is used by the property and by the method to create the objects that are contained by the property. 此方法调用 方法为集合中的每个字段创建用户界面（UI）控件。This method calls the method to create the user interface (UI) controls for each field in the collection. 页导航字段在 控件中创建，其顺序与页导航字段在 @no__t 集合中的显示顺序相同。The pager fields are created in the control in the order that the pager fields appear in the collection. 下表显示派生自 @no__t 0 类并可以在 @no__t 1 控件中创建的页导航字段类。The following table shows the pager field classes that derive from the class and that can be created in the control. |页导航字段类型Pager field type|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||允许用户一次一页地浏览数据页，或跳转到第一个或最后一个数据页。Enables users to navigate through pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data.| ||允许用户按页码选择数据页。Enables users to select a page of data by page number.| ||使您能够创建自定义分页 UI。Enables you to create a custom paging UI.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页导航字段在 控件中显示的顺序与页导航字段在 @no__t 集合中的显示顺序相同。The pager fields are displayed in the control in the order that the pager fields appear in the collection. 下表显示派生自 类的页导航字段类，并且可以在 @no__t 集合中使用。The following table shows the pager field classes that derive from the class and that can be used in the collection. |页导航字段类型Pager field type|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||允许用户一次一页地浏览数据页，或跳转到第一个或最后一个数据页。Enables users to navigate through pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data.| ||允许用户按页码选择数据页。Enables users to select a page of data by page number.| ||使您能够创建自定义分页 UI。Enables you to create a custom paging UI.| 若要以声明方式为 控件指定页导航字段，请将 @no__t 元素添加到 @no__t 控件中。To declaratively specify the pager fields for a control, put a `Fields` element inside the control. 然后，可以列出要包含在开始和结束 @no__t 标记之间的页导航字段。You can then list the pager fields you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 可以通过编程方式将页导航字段添加到 @no__t 集合中。You can programmatically add pager fields to the collection. 但是，在 控件中以声明方式列出页导航字段更为简单。However, it is easier to list the pager fields declaratively in the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式将页导航字段添加到 @no__t 控件的 @no__t 集合。The following example shows how to declaratively add pager fields to the collection of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/CS/DataPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/VB/DataPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性将 @no__t 对象动态添加到 @no__t 2 控件。The following example shows how to use the property to dynamically add a object to a control. 此代码示例是为 构造函数提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 检索与 控件关联的数据绑定控件。

span.span: Retrieves the data-bound control that is associated with the control.

returns.span: 与 控件关联的数据绑定控件。

span.span: The data-bound control that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索到的数据绑定控件引用一个数据源对象，该对象包含 控件页的数据。The data-bound control retrieved by this method references a data source object that contains the data that the control pages. 为了使 @no__t 0 控件能够对此数据进行分页，数据绑定控件必须实现 接口。For the control to be able to page this data, the data-bound control must implement the interface. @No__t-0 方法检查 @no__t 属性是否设置为数据绑定控件的 ID。The method checks whether the property is set to the ID of a data-bound control. 如果未设置 属性，@no__t 方法将向上定位用于查找数据绑定控件的命名容器堆栈。If the property is not set, the method goes up the stack of naming containers to look for a data-bound control. 例如，如果 @no__t 0 控件位于 控件的 @no__t 1 模板内，则无需设置 @no__t 3 属性。For example, if the control is inside the template of a control, the property does not have to be set. 这是因为 方法可以通过检查控件树来自动查找 @no__t 1 控件。This is because the method can automatically find the control by examining the control tree.

exception.span: 未在页面上找到实现 接口的控件。

span.span: A control that implements the interface was not found on the page.
-or-

exception.span: 属性指定的控件未实现 接口。

span.span: The control specified by the property does not implement the interface.
-or-
The control does not have a naming container.
ListView Web Server Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过此方法通知时，Web 服务器控件必须执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required in order to create and set up an instance. 在服务器控件生命周期的此阶段中，尚未填充控件的视图状态。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has not yet been populated. 此外，如果调用此方法，则不能访问其他服务器控件，无论它是此控件的子控件还是父控件。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 不保证其他服务器控件已创建并且可供访问。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). @No__t-0 方法还使派生类可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks @No__t-0 方法通知服务器控件它应执行与该控件关联的页的每个 HTTP 请求所共有的操作。The method notifies the server control that it should perform actions that are common to each HTTP request for the page that it is associated with. 在页面生命周期的此阶段，会创建和初始化层次结构中的服务器控件。At this stage in the page life cycle, server controls in the hierarchy are created and initialized. 视图状态已还原，窗体控件反映从客户端发布的值。View state is restored, and form controls reflect values that were posted from the client. 此实现还会调用 方法来查找实现 接口的容器控件，并初始化页属性。This implementation also invokes the method to find the container control that implements the interface, and it initializes the page properties. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). @No__t-0 方法还使派生类可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

exception.span: 未找到实现 接口的容器控件。

span.span: A container control that implements the interface was not found.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个控件的 ，该控件包含的数据将由 控件进行分页。

span.span: Gets or sets the of the control that contains the data that will be paged by the control.

value.span: 一个控件的 ，该控件包含的数据将由 控件进行分页。

span.span: The of the control that contains the data that will be paged by the control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定包含 控件将分页的数据的控件的 @no__t 1。Use the property to specify the of the control that contains the data that will be paged by the control. 指定的控件必须实现 @no__t 的接口，并且必须使用与 @no__t 1 控件相同的命名容器。The specified control must implement the interface and must use the same naming container as the control. 可以指定的控件的一个示例是 @no__t 0 控件。An example of a control that you can specify is the control. 如果此属性为空字符串或 `null`，则 @no__t 1 控件会检查其容器控件是否实现了 @no__t 2 接口。If this property is an empty string or `null`, the control checks whether its container control implements the interface. 例如，在 控件中，如果将 控件置于 @no__t 3 模板内，则无需设置 @no__t。For example, in the control, the property does not have to be set if you put the control inside the template. 这是因为 控件可以通过检查控件树来自动查找 @no__t 1 控件。This is because the control can automatically find the control by examining the control tree. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性以动态方式将 @no__t 1 控件与 @no__t 控件进行关联。The following example shows how to use the property to dynamically associate a control with a control. 此代码示例是为 构造函数提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor/CS/DataPagerCtorCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor/VB/DataPagerCtorVB.aspx#2)] 下面的示例演示如何在 @no__t 的控件中以声明方式设置 属性，以便对 @no__t 控件的数据进行分页。The following example shows how to declaratively set the property in a control in order to page the data of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID/CS/DataPagerPagedControlIDCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID/VB/DataPagerPagedControlIDVB.aspx#1)]

The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定数据页的大小。Use the property to specify the size of a page of data. 如果页面中有多个 控件绑定到同一个 @no__t 1 控件，请确保将这些控件的 @no__t 2 属性设置为相同的值。If you have multiple controls in a page that are bound to the same control, be sure to set the property of these controls to the same value. 如果将 @no__t 0 的控件设置为使用不同的页面大小，则要初始化的最后一个 @no__t 控件将确定 @no__t 控件的实际页面大小。If the controls are set to use different page sizes, the last control to be initialized determines the actual page size of the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 @no__t 1 控件中以声明方式设置 属性以及如何动态更改其值。The following example shows how to declaratively set the property in a control and how to dynamically change its value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize/CS/DataPagerPageSizeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize/VB/DataPagerPageSizeVB.aspx#1)]

Public Property QueryStringField As String
public: property System::String ^ QueryStringField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QueryStringField : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置查询字符串字段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the query string field.

value.span: 查询字符串字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the query string field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串，指示 控件将使用 HTTP POST 命令在页面中导航。

span.span: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the control will use a HTTP POST command to navigate through the pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可指定 @no__t 控件使用 HTTP GET 命令在页面间导航。Use the property to specify that the control uses an HTTP GET command to navigate through the pages. 在 GET 请求中，包含名称/值对的查询字符串字段将添加到页面的 URL 中。In GET requests, a query string field that consists of a name/value pair is added to the URL of the page. 该名称通过使用 属性来设置。The name is set by using the property. 该值是对应的页码。The value is the corresponding page number. 如果 @no__t 为空字符串或 @no__t 为-1，则控件会使用 HTTP POST 命令在页面中导航。If is an empty string or `null`, the control uses an HTTP POST command to navigate through the pages. 如果希望通过搜索引擎对数据的所有页面进行索引，则设置此属性很有用。Setting this property is useful if you want to have all the pages of data indexed by a search engine. 出现这种情况的原因是，控件为每个数据页生成了不同的 URL。This occurs because the control produces a different URL for each page of data. 设置 属性时，可能会出现以下情况：When you set the property, the following conditions might apply: - 一个页面上有多个 控件，它们引用相同的数据绑定控件。You have more than one control in a page and they reference the same data-bound control. 在这种情况下，请确保这些 @no__t 控件的 属性设置为相同的值。In that case, make sure that the property of these controls is set to the same value. - 一个页面上有多个 控件，它们引用不同的数据绑定控件。You have more than one control in a page and they reference different data-bound controls. 在这种情况下，请确保这些 @no__t 控件的 属性设置为不同的值。In that case, make sure that the property of these controls is set to different values. 如果将 @no__t 0 个控件设置为相同的值，将同时对关联的数据绑定控件进行分页，因为它们将使用相同的查询字符串字段。If you set the controls to the same value, the associated data-bound controls will be paginated at the same time, because they will use the same query-string field. 如果未遵循上述准则，可能会出现意外的分页行为。If you do not follow the previous guidelines, unexpected paging behavior can occur. 但是，控件不会引发异常。However, no exception will be thrown by the control. 如果 属性不是空字符串或 `null`，则将忽略 @no__t 或 @no__t 对象的 属性的值。If property is not an empty string or `null`, the value of the property of or objects is ignored. 在这种情况下，这些对象使用 0 @no__t 控件来创建其导航按钮。In that case, these objects use the control to create their navigation buttons. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 @no__t 控件中以声明方式设置 属性，以便通过使用查询字符串在各个页面之间导航。The following example shows how to declaratively set the property in a control in order to navigate through the pages by using a query string. 此示例包含两个 @no__t 0 的控件，这些控件用于逐页浏览单个 @no__t 控件显示的数据。This example contains two controls that are used to page through the data that is displayed by a single control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField/CS/DataPagerQueryStringFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField/VB/DataPagerQueryStringFieldVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后发生的任何 控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any changes to an control's view-state that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 返回 控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是 @no__t 1 类的实例。These values are automatically put in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象将作为存储在页面中隐藏元素中的变量发送到浏览器。When view state is saved, this string object is sent to the browser as a variable that is stored in a hidden element in the page. 创建自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的 `ViewState` 属性来提高效率。When you create custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying the server control's `ViewState` property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员用于扩展 控件。This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the control.

summary.span: 在设计时创建 控件的子控件。

span.span: Creates the child controls of the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks @No__t-0 方法使设计 @no__t 器能够在设计时重新创建控件的子控件。The method enables a designer for the control to re-create the control's child controls at design time. @No__t 的接口方法调用了 方法，该方法包含实际的实现，控件开发人员可以扩展该方法。The interface method invokes the method, which contains the actual implementation and which can be extended by control developers.

summary.span: 跟踪 控件的视图状态更改，以便可以将这些更改存储在该控件的 对象中。

span.span: Tracks view-state changes to the control so that they can be stored in the control's object.

summary.span: 可以通过 属性访问此对象。

span.span: This object can be accessed through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 控件生命周期的 @no__t 1 事件结束时，将自动调用 方法。The method is called automatically at the end of the event in the control's life cycle. 此方法警报 ASP.NET 监视对 @no__t 服务器控件的视图状态所做的更改。This method alerts ASP.NET to monitor changes to the server control's view state.
